tool_description: The BPOM API is an innovative bridge that connects the world of technology with the health and food safety aspects in Indonesia. With the BPOM API, developers can access and utilize real-time data related to the registration of drugs, food, and cosmetics overseen by this institution. This API provides an opportunity for applications and services to deliver accurate and verified information to users, enabling them to make informed decisions regarding the products they consume.
